Description: Chisel with a wooden handle and copper alloy blade. The blade flares out at the cutting edge.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Thebes (historic - Upper Egypt), Acessioned with basket EA 6026
Curator's comments: For a range of chisels (wood handle, metal blade) from Deir el-Medina, see Les artistes de pharaon (exhibition catalogue, Paris, 2003), 196-7.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1998/9 Oct-Jun, South Carolina, The Charleston Museum, Queens Commoners of the New Kingdom
